Introduction

IROPIRO (Korean: 이로피로), short for IROIRO Philosophy (色々フィロソフィー) is a three-member live girl group under To Hermitage. They debuted on May 15, 2022 with a live stage performance at the IDOL PALETTE Vol. 21 - Chapter 1: Colorless Philosophy event in the Live Hall Prism venue in Mapo-gu, Seoul. On June 2, they had their official music debut with the release of the mini album, Chapter 1: Colorless Philosophy. Their group name is Japanese and means "various philosophies".
